attributes.action: Reinstate the inside lane on smart motorways as a hard shoulder.
attributes.background: To reinstate the inside lane on the M1 and other smart motorways, as a hard shoulder and take it out use. It only being opened as a fourth lane when needed.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Ban Smart Motorways
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570967

Moratorium and review of "Smart Motorways" and associated works
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549295
